Scriptal.Name: Print Event Args
Scriptal.Description: Prints arguments from the event, for debugging purposes.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: InfCore.DebugPrint("args Debug Info:") InfCore.DebugPrint("|[1|NUMBER]|: ".. tostring(|[1|NUMBER]|) .. " (" .. type(|[1|NUMBER]|) .. ")") InfCore.DebugPrint("|[2|NUMBER]|: ".. tostring(|[2|NUMBER]|) .. " (" .. type(|[2|NUMBER]|) .. ")") InfCore.DebugPrint("|[3|NUMBER]|: ".. tostring(|[3|NUMBER]|) .. " (" .. type(|[3|NUMBER]|) .. ")") InfCore.DebugPrint("|[4|NUMBER]|: ".. tostring(|[4|NUMBER]|) .. " (" .. type(|[4|NUMBER]|) .. ")")

Choice.Name: Argument 1
Choice.Description: The first arg sent from the StrCode32 message.

Choice.Name: Argument 2
Choice.Description: The second arg sent from the StrCode32 message.

Choice.Name: Argument 3
Choice.Description: The third arg sent from the StrCode32 message.

Choice.Name: Argument 4
Choice.Description: The fourth arg sent from the StrCode32 message.
